title: LFM gold plus Team members who want to be on a sub team
body:
This team is designated on being an team for Dream Tech Gaming to scrim against. We are looking for players who want to compete for a spot in the actual team but are willing to work for it. comment your
1. IGN
2.Role
3. are you okay with being on a sub team and not the actual team?
4. top 3 champs for that lane

replies.body:
1. IGN: Senpai Mercy
2.Role : ADC
3. are you okay with being on a sub team and not the actual team?: yes
4. top 3 champs for that lane: Cait Vayne Corki
